citation: Proclamation under the Gaming Control Amendment (Community Interest) Act 2016 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Gaming Control Amendment (Community Interest) Act 2016

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Gaming Control Amendment (Community Interest) Act 2016 fix 1 September 2017 as the day on which Part 3 of that Act commences.

7 August 2017

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

PETER GUTWEIN

Treasurer

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 16 August 2017
